programming_cards.title: Galaxy Spin Mapping
programming_cards.description: A Python module that can be used to calculate the redshift of MaNGA galaxy pixels by fitting well-known emission lines. I use this to construct a rotation map of two example galaxies, as well as calculate their total redshift to 1% accuracy.

programming_cards.title: Raspberry Pi Quantum Server
programming_cards.description: A server that can run OpenQASM quantum programs. It currently runs on my own Raspberry Pi.

programming_cards.title: QASM Code Editor
programming_cards.description: A client program for my Raspberry Pi quantum server. If my server is running, you can use this to write and run OpenQASM quantum programs. It also visualises the circuit as you go, and plots the results.

programming_cards.title: QAOA Max-Cut
programming_cards.description: A Quantum algorithm that can find an approximate solution to the Max-Cut problem.

programming_cards.title: Quantum Circuit Simulator
programming_cards.description: A Python module that simulates quantum circuits. Gates are applied to qubits using function chaining.

programming_cards.title: Neural Network By Hand
programming_cards.description: A feed-forward neural network I made from scratch using only Numpy.

programming_cards.title: Number Classifier
programming_cards.description: A drawing pad app that tries to guess which number you drew. The underlying classifier makes use of a pretrained Convolutional Neural Network.

programming_cards.title: Ideal and Non-Ideal Gas Simulation
programming_cards.description: A simulation of ideal and non-ideal gasses in 2-dimensions as circles with elastic collisions. For collision detection, I made use of a spatial hash map, which allows the program to handle upwards of 2500 particles without any significant performance drop.

programming_cards.title: DuckTop
programming_cards.description: A cute duck to keep you company on your desktop.

programming_cards.title: Mushroom Mosaic
programming_cards.description: A Python program that can recreates images as a mosaic of mushrooms.

programming_cards.title: Fourier Transforms in C++
programming_cards.description: A C++ library with an FFT algorithm and a few useful applied FFT methods.

programming_cards.title: Random Variable Distributions in C
programming_cards.description: A C library for generating Random Variables according to a few common probability distributions. Also contains a Python wrapper for the library.

programming_cards.title: C Base Layer
programming_cards.description: Some basic C utilities including data structures, algorithms and various math structures such as vectors, matrices and useful mathematical algorithms.

programming_cards.title: ASCII Art Generator
programming_cards.description: A GUI and terminal program which can create an ASCII artwork from an image. The GUI is made using the tkinter module.

programming_cards.title: Wordle Clone
programming_cards.description: A clone of Wordle, written in Python using the pygame module.
